message.name: ERR_MALFORMED_URL
message.locale: The URL passed in is malformed.

message.name: ERR_XRV_NAME_UNIQUE
message.locale: The Name has already been defined for an External System.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CURAM_CLIENT_ALIAS_UNIQUE
message.locale: The Curam Client Alias has already been defined for an External System.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CLIENT_ALIAS_UNIQUE
message.locale: The Client Alias has already been defined for an External System.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PUBLIC_KEY_ALIAS_UNIQUE
message.locale: The Public Key Alias has already been defined for an External System.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PROPERTIES_FILENAME_EXTENSION_INVALID
message.locale: The cryptography file name must end with .properties.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CLIENTCONFIGFILENAME_EXTENSION__INVALID
message.locale: The client configuration file name must end with .wsdd.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CANNOT_CANCEL_ASSPCIATED_WITH_PROGRAM_TYPE
message.locale: This External System cannot be removed as associations to Programs exist.
